title: Baby, Would I Lie?
description: Branson, Missouri, is the home of Country Music USA, big hairdos, phony snakeskin boots and the most scandalous murder trial ever to hit the country music scene. Sara Joslyn and Jack Ingersoll, journalists for a notorious tabloid, are there as well, to expose every dirty detail. From the author of Smoke and Trust Me on This.
author: Donald E. Westlake
